name: BeSwitched Tournament
description:
BeSwitched Tournaments is the Skillz version of BeSwitched; one of the most beautiful and highly rated match games on the app store!

Challenge real players from around the world on Skillz, the #1 competition platform on mobile devices. Play BeSwitched Tournaments with cash or virtual currency to earn rewards and cash prizes!

- Beautiful 3D environments, characters & special effects greatly enhance your game play fun!
- Fluid piece movement with the ability to make matches while the board is moving!
- A nearly endless supply of puzzles awaits you, play now!
